content.question: In the portrait Tamati Waka Nene, the subject’s mana, or power, is displayed through the inclusion of which of the following?

choices.label: A cloak covered with kiwi feathers
A carved staff adorned with cowrie shells
A headdress made of woven raffia

content.answer: A cloak covered with kiwi feathers

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
